divs: sighting detailsi was in the garden at night and saw what looked like a very bright star but it was obviously moving slightly. it seemed like it was trying to be still, like a helicopter hovering in the wind, but every now and then it would move away slightly but quickly, and then return to the same general spot. it was very slowly getting lower. it was a constant bright light and made no noise. it seemed to be about a mile or two away and maybe half a mile or a mile above ground. i looked at it through binnoculars but couldn't see anything but the brighness of the light. i watched it for 20 minutes and then got bored!! i went out for about half hour and when i came home it was gone :-\
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fulshear
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright constant star like light hovering and moving around like a hand held gun laser sight on a target and very slowly descending
